title: People who say bronze is hell are FOOLS
body:
Bronze is freaking Paradice compared to silver lol.


Started season B4, got all the way up to S3...and seriously, i get WORST team in S3 than i had in B1-2...like...awefull team.


It almost make me feel like trolign and feeding on purpose jsut to lose game faster and get back in bronze....game was more enjoyable there.
